content: lace dress & crown this dress is designed to fit my 22 cm dolls <3 materials & tools yarn basically you can use any type of filet crochet yarn suitable for a 1 5 mm crochet hook i used pro lana häkelstar 100 #33 & gründl häkelgarn 100 #121 sewing needle scissors crochet hook 1 5 mm abbreviations chain chain stitch double_crochet double_crochet stitch skip skip double_crochet-increase double_crochet increase single_crochet single_crochet stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch st sts stitch stitches fo fasten_off round round picot 3 chain slip_stitch in 1st chain x repeat instructions inside brackets as instructions inside brackets are many times as indicated crocheted in same stitch as explained after the brackets if you have any questions please don t hesitate to contact me amy@ballek at amy s dreams copyright this pattern is copyrighted and for personal use only it is prohibited to translate copy distribute digital nor printed or re-sell this pattern including the contents of this document in any way products made from this pattern can be sold only if they reference the designer & author ©amy s dreams sabine ballek icons flaticon com lace dress row/ round begin with 33 chain 1 start in 4th chain from the hook 3 chain count as first double_crochet make 30 double_crochet turn 2 3 chain count as first double_crochet skip st double_crochet-increase double_crochet x 15 turn 3 3 chain count as first double_crochet skip st 3 double_crochet in gap between double_crochet-increase of last row double_crochet in single double_crochet of last row x 15 turn 3 double_crochet inbetween double_crochet-increase of last row 1 double_crochet in single double_crochet of last row 4 3 chain count as first double_crochet skip 2 sts 4 double_crochet in central double_crochet of the 3dc of last row skip st double_crochet in single double_crochet of last row skip st x 15 turn single double_crochet 4 double_crochet row 4 finished 5 3 chain count as first double_crochet skip a few sts 5 double_crochet in gap between the 2nd & 3rd of the 4dc of last row double_crochet in single double_crochet of last row x 2 skip the next 3 sequences of 4 double_crochet + single double_crochet of last row to create the first armhole then make 5 double_crochet in gap between the 2nd & 3rd of the 4dc of last row double_crochet in single double_crochet of last row x 5 skip the next 3 sequences of 4 double_crochet + single double_crochet of last row to create the second armhole then make 5 double_crochet in gap between the 2nd & 3rd of the 4dc of last row double_crochet in single double_crochet of last row x 2 turn single double_crochet 5 double_crochet in gap between 2nd & 3rd double_crochet of 4dc of last row 1st armhole after row 5 6 4 chain 3 chain count as first double_crochet skip 3 sts 3 double_crochet 2 chain 3 double_crochet in the central double_crochet of the 5 double_crochet of last row chain skip 2 sts double_crochet in single double_crochet of last row chain skip
